'''v0.11.1 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Minecraft Pocket Edition]]'' released to fix bugs regarding world crashes and unavailable skin packs.<ref name="0.11.1">{{tweet|_tomcc|606495708372336641|0.11.1 is out and it should fix the world crash + unavailable Skin Packs, thanks to Apple for letting us jump the queue :P|4 Jun 2015}}</ref><br><br>This version was reuploaded in an unknown date.{{more info}}

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Health]]'''
* Can no longer be filled by exiting and entering the game.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=0.11.1
|; From released versions before 0.11.0
|7879|Missing Items after save and reduced file size.
|7929|No warning when a creeper is about to explode on LAN
|; From the 0.11.0 development versions
|8349| Other players in local multiplayer cannot sail in a boat.
|8656|Health restored to full every time the player loads their game.
|8773|Players other than the host spawn at the highest point of the spawn when on multiplayer.
}}</onlyinclude>
'''Other'''
* Fixed bugs regarding world crashes and unavailable skin packs.
